maqras.text: 90|1|Ami [1] sapatha karachi e nagarera [2]
90|2|ara apani e nagarera adhibasi [1]
90|3|sapatha janmadatara o ya se janma diyeche [1].
90|4|Nihsandehe amara manusake srsti karechi kasta-klesera madhye [1].
90|5|Se ki mane kare ye, kakhano tara upara ke'u ksamatabana habe na
90|6|se bale, ‘ami pracura artha nihsesa karechi [1].’
90|7|Se ki mane kare ye, take ke'u dekheni
90|8|amara ki tara jan'ya srsti karini ducokha
90|9|Ara jihba o du'i thomta
90|10|ara amara take dekhiyechi [1] du’ti patha [2].
90|11|Tabe se to bandhura giripathe [1] prabesa kareni.
90|12|Ara kise apanake janabe--- bandhura giripatha ki
90|13|eta hacche: Dasamukti [1]
90|14|athaba durbhiksera dine khadyadana [1]—
90|15|iyatima atmiyake [1]
90|16|athaba daridra-nispesita nihsbake
90|17|tadupari se tadera antarbhukta haye yaya yara imana eneche ebam parasparake upadesa diyeche dhairya dharanera, ara paraspara upadesa diyeche daya anugrahera [1]
90|18|tara'i saubhagyasali.
90|19|Ara yara amadera ayatasamuhe kuphari kareche, tara'i hatabhagya.
90|20|Tara paribestita habe abarud'dha agune.
91|1|Sapatha suryera ebam tara kiranera [1]
91|2|sapatha camdera, yakhana ta suryera para abirbhuta haya [1]
91|3|sapatha dinera, yakhana se suryake prakasa kare [1]
91|4|sapatha ratera, yakhana se suryake acchadita kare [1]
91|5|sapatha asamanera ebam yini ta nirmana karechena tamra [1]
91|6|sapatha jaminera ebam yini ta bistrta karechena tamra [1]
91|7|sapatha naphsera [1] ebam yini ta subin'yasta karechena tamra [2]
91|8|tarapara take tara satkajera ebam tara asat-kajera jnana dana karechena [1] –
91|9|se-i saphalakama hayeche, ye nijeke pabitra kareche.
91|10|Ara se-i byartha hayeche, ye nijeke kalusita kareche [1].
91|11|Samuda sampradaya abadhyatabasata [1] mithyaropa karechila.
91|12|Tadera madhye ye sarbadhika hatabhagya, se yakhana tatpara haye uthala
91|13|takhana allahara rasula taderake balalena, ‘allahara ustri o take pani pana karanora bisaye sabadhana ha'o [1].’
91|14|Kintu tara tara prati mithyaropa karala ebam ustrike jaba'i karala [1]. Phale tadera papera jan'ya tadera raba taderake samule dhbansa kare ekakara kare dilena [2].
91|15|Ara tini era parinamake bhaya karena na [1].
92|1|Sapatha ratera, yakhana se acchanna kare
92|2|sapatha dinera, yakhana ta udbhasita haya
92|3|sapatha tamra, yini nara o nari srsti karechena
92|4|Niscaya tomadera karmapracesta bibhinna prakrtira [1].
92|5|Kaje'i [1] ke'u dana karale, taka'oya abalambana karale
92|6|ebam ya uttama ta satya bale grahana karale
92|7|amara tara jan'ya sugama kare deba sahaja patha [1].
92|8|Ara [1] ke'u karpanya karale ebam nijake amukhapeksi mane karale
92|9|ara ya uttama tate mithyaropa karale
92|10|tara jan'ya amara sugama kare deba kathora patha [1].
92|11|Ara tara sampada tara kono kaje asabe na, yakhana se dhbansa habe [1].
92|12|Niscaya amadera kaja sudhu pathanirdesa kara [1]
92|13|ara amara'i to malika akheratera o prathamatira (duniyara) [1].
92|14|Atahpara ami tomaderake lelihana aguna [1] samparke satarka kare diyechi.
92|15|Tate prabesa karabe se-i, ye nitanta hatabhagya
92|16|ye mithyaropa kare o mukha phiriye neya [1].
92|17|Ara ta theke dure rakha habe parama muttakike
92|18|ye sbiya sampada dana kare atasud'dhira jan'ya [1]
92|19|ebam tara prati kara'o emana kono anugraha ne'i yara pratidana dite habe [1]
92|20|sudhu tara mahana rabera sastustira pratyasaya
92|21|ara acire'i se sastusta habe [1].
93|1|Sapatha purbahnera
93|2|sapatha ratera yakhana ta haya nijhuma [1] –
93|3|apanara raba apanake parityaga karena ni [1] ebam sakrata'o karena ni.
93|4|Ara abasya'i apanara jan'ya parabarti samaya purbabati samayera ceye sreya [1].
93|5|Ara acire'i apanara raba apanake anugraha dana karabena, phale apani santusta habena [1].
93|6|Tini ki apanake iyatima abasthaya pana ni? Atahpara tini asraya diyechena [1]
93|7|ara tini apanake pelena patha samparke anabahita, atahpara tini pathera nirdesa dilena [1].
93|8|Ara tini apanake pelena nihsba abasthaya, atahpara abhaba mukta karalena [1].
93|9|Kaje'i apani iyatimera prati kathora habena na [1].
93|10|Ara prarthike bhartsana karabena na [1].
93|11|Ara apani apanara rabera anugrahera katha janiye dina [1].
